POST.POST_BODY: so I was told I didn't pass my hr test I have 2 weeks go back and do the 3 hr test. Any suggestions and what I should be doing?

RESPONSE.RESPONSE_BODY:
Hi Yani,

did you go back and do the 3 hour test already?

In the meantime, avoid eating sweets and fruit juices etc.  and focus on eating plenty of vegetables and meats, but not too much carbs.  Exercise / walk as much as you reasonable can.

let us know how you went.
